Name: rtorrent_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from rTorrent. MIT Licensed.

Name: monkey-rs
Description: A Rust implementation of the Monkey programming language from https://interpreterbook.com/. MIT Licensed.

Name: rtorrent
Description: Package rtorrent implements a client for rTorrent.  MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: raw
Description: Package raw enables reading and writing data at the device driver level for a network interface.  MIT Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: eui64
Description: Package eui64 enables creation and parsing of Modified EUI-64 format interface identifiers, as described in RFC 4291, Section 2.5.1.  MIT Licensed.

Name: rfc4193
Description: Package rfc4193 implements Unique Local IPv6 Unicast Address prefix generation, as described in RFC 4193. MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
